text.title: Virginia reporter, cameraman killed on live TV, alleged shooter commits suicide
text.head: Virginia reporter, cameraman killed on live TV, alleged shooter commits suicide
Sources

list.item: AP. "Gunman in deadly on-air attack dies after manhunt" — CBS News , August 26, 2015
